Folk & Intimate.description: Warm strings, low light, and stories that feel like home.

Queer Revelry.vibe_notes: A jubilant celebration of queer joy.

Dreamlike & Hypnagogic.description: Time blurs. Your breath slows. Reality becomes suggestion.

Wonder & Awe.description: For when you want to feel small and lit from within.

Grief & Grace.description: For when you need to feel the ache, but also the holding.

Poetic.description: Language that shimmers. Performances with soul-rhythm.

The Thoughtful Stage.vibe_notes: Theatre that makes you lean in.

Something I Wouldn't Normally Pick.description: A gentle nudge outside the usual.

Late-Night Lark.vibe_notes: For when the city stays up with you.

Comic Relief.description: For the belly-laugh you didn't know you needed.

Word & Voice.vibe_notes: The hush of the room, the lyric of the light.

Salon & Spark.description: Curious minds gather. Come think with us.
Salon & Spark.vibe_notes: A little wine, a lot of questions.

Rant & Rapture.description: Electrifying expression, righteous anger, ecstatic fervour.

Big Night Out.vibe_notes: A crowd, a cocktail, a damn good night.

Romanticised London.description: For gaslight nostalgia and Victorian dreams.
Romanticised London.vibe_notes: London as you imagined it in books.

Nostalgic / Vintage / Retro.description: Old glamour, faded elegance, time-worn beauty.

Spiritual / Sacred / Mystical.description: Where the veil thins and reverence rises.

Body-Based / Movement-Led.description: Dance, circus, physical theatre â€” the body as language.

Melancholic Beauty.vibe_notes: Beauty that breaks your heart a little.

Curious Encounters.description: For the experimentally-minded and perpetually curious.
Curious Encounters.vibe_notes: You never quite know what you'll find.

Seasonal / Outdoor.description: Under stars or sun, gardens and rooftops.
Seasonal / Outdoor.vibe_notes: For when the city needs sky.

Witchy & Wild.vibe_notes: For when you want to howl at something.

Family-Friendly.vibe_notes: Where wonder has no age limit.
